flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as
a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s
appearance. The ice will be restored when it hails.
flavor_text_entries.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon's ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon's appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows.
